actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to take into account economic and technological feasibility in determining whether or not to approve State implementation plans.

summary.text: Amends the Clean Air Act to direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to take into account the economic and technological feasibility of State implementation plans in determining whether to approve such plans.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to take into account economic and technological feasibility in determining whether or not to approve State implementation plans.
